headline: 3 Unstoppable Stocks That Are Too Cheap to Ignore Right Now
summary: The stock market is full of expensive and cheap stocks, but the hard part is determining which are still worth buying at their current price tag.  Three stocks that look cheap but are fantastic companies are Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing (NYSE: TSM), Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOG) (NASDAQ: GOOGL), and Adobe (NASDAQ: ADBE).  Forward earnings multiples use analyst projections to value the company, which inherently has errors.
